about_the_game:
The game allows users to easily build the own top down shooters, with our unique developer users can create a wide range of different maps and levels, customize the player and enemy characters and change the look of everything, its incredibly easy to use, and perfect for anyone looking to create their own top down shooter easily and quickly.

Basically how it works users are given a game template for a 2D top down shooter, they can use a number of tools to create different levels and then make their game unique by importing images to replace the player and the enemy characters. almost all objects in our game can be edited.

Users can then edit the settings for the player and any enemy character to make their levels easier or harder for other players.

Generating maps couldn't be easier simple upload a image made on paint or Photoshop and our unique application will turn the image into a game world, to help new players out we have also included some sample maps to get users started.

Once the user has created their top down shooter they can save their creation as a package file, this allows the to export the content and create their own top down shooter in no time at all.

What is included:

- Unnamed Arcade engine which allows you to make your own top down shooter.

- 10 unique maps to get you started and understanding how to play our game.

- 2 tutorial videos showing users how the game works.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 140 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Paint Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 140 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Paint Required
